title: Ep 332: The Poto King
itunes:title: Ep 332: The Poto King
description:
Bobby joins pedicure nation. Julia Childs is Khalyla. We talk fish hell, the top 5 fruits, comic casting of Naked & Afraid, and the Lee household's new Poto King. 

Go to www.brooklinen.com and use promo code tiger for $20 off your purchase of $100 or more.

Download the FanDuel Sportsbook app, use promo code BELLY and pick your Conference Championship team before kickoff.
